summary:
A new series of skin textures designed with realism in mind, this mod provides a more real and natural looking body texture and normal map and incorporates small surface \"Imperfections\" 
like moles, acne and sub-dermal scarring, as well as a series of larger \"Battle Scars\".
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i1161.photobucket.com/albums/q502/betterbecause/tp.png[/IMG]

 Welcome and thankyou for dowloading Body Imperfect v2.3


 About the mod://////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

 Put simply, this is a set of textures desighned with realism in mind.
 With all the body textures out there I never really one that suited me completely, after all, between escaping a dragon ravaged military outpost,
 confronting a legion of wyrms bent on world domination and taking on what seems to be the whole of the imperial army/stormcloak rebellion, you\'d 
 think you would have a few marks to show for it, but no, nary a dirty smudge to show for all my heroic ventures.

 This mod adds text-blendable scars for both face and body to skyrim as well as four body texture sets of varying gritiness, ranging from \"Pristine\"
 to \"Dirty as hell\".

 My in intention is to provide a more realistic skin option for costom body users, who like myself are tired of looking at plastic fair-skinned 
 dolls with all character and personality of a PVC figurine. 

 

 Requirments:///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

 A CBBE compatible body.

 Caliente\'s Texure blender.


 Installation://////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
 
For The Body:

 Simply select a texture set, Base01-Bas04 and copy/paste the contents to the appropriate folder within you skyrim data directory.
 (data/textures/actors/character/female) I have included four different texture sets for the body Their references are as follows:

Base01 - Very clean, only a little dirtier than Caliente\'s original textures.
Base02 - A little dirtier but still reasonable, comparable to Skyrims vanilla textures.
Base03 - Much dirtier.
Base04 - Dirty as hell, Includes normal mapped mud smears and spatters. 


 Note: 
 You will need to copy and paste \"ALL NINE\" dds. files.

For the scars:

 The \"Scars\" in this pack are \"Tex-Blenable\", so you will need caliente\'s texture blender utility to use them.
  
 To install scars, open the folder labeled \"data\" and copy/paste the \"Library\" folder to your Tex-blend data directory.
 Click yes when it asks to \"Merge Folders\" and simply install the scars as you would any other tex-blend file (i.e neck blend, wrist and foot blend)

 Note:
 The scars incorporate all three standard formats (surface,normal map and specular map), your will need to go through and install all three
 layers for every scar. They all share identical titles to make sorting easier, they are merley found in different directories, their references are 
 as follows: 

 Body

 BIPack01Scar01 - thigh
 BIPack01Scar02 - abdominal
 BIPack01Scar03 - back
 BIPack01Scar04 - chest
 BIPack01Scar05 - shoulder

 Face

 BIPack01Scar01 - jaw
 BIPack01Scar02 - nose
 BIPack01Scar03 - lip
 BIPack01Scar04 - temple
 BIPack01Scar05 - eye
 BIPack01Scar06 - bridge


 Changelog://////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
 
 Fixed wrist, side and arm seams.

 Reduced neck seam.

 fixed normal maps.
 
 Converted all files to lossless dds. format.
 
 added three new body bases.

 added scars as tex-blendable add-on.

 cleaned up base texture for better blending.


 Recommended mods://////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
 
 \"Fitness Body\" by Svarog - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16731
 \"GRRL Body V2_CBBE\" by tonicmole - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12707
 \"Realistic Female Face Skin HD\" by EcthelionOtW - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23447
 \"High Resolution Scars\" by Xenius - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4784
 \"Custom Races\" by d_rail - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8720
 \"Stakado Cinemascope ENB - Near to zero performance loss\" by Stakado - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15425


 Credits:///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

 SvarogNL - for the normals.
 tonicmole - for the Body textures.
 EcthelionOtW - for the face textures.
 Xenius - for the scars.
 d_rail1602 - for an awsome mod.
 Nevetsea - for the Body texures.
 Caliente - for the Body textures.
 Bethesda - for an awsome game.
 The nexus community - for all the feedback and support.
author: betterbecause
